fields.Title: Limbic System: "*Beeaautiful*... Believe me, stupid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Beeaautiful*... Believe me, stupid ape, its lack of beauty was *not* the problem.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know. It could have been q..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. It could have been quite a while." He looks you in the eye, as if inspecting your mental state.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You dropped this -- are you okay t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You dropped this -- are you okay to proceed?"

fields.Title: Coupris Kineema: "Glowing lights on a dashboard emerg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Glowing lights on a dashboard emerge out of nothingness.

fields.Title: You: "Just nod. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Just nod. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "Yes, that."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, that.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There is nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is nothing.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Because it's always there."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because it's always there.

fields.Title: You: "And who was *that*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And who was *that*?

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "The Ledger of Failure and Hatred is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Ledger of Failure and Hatred is a special item that can be used both as an INTERACTABLE and a TOOL equipped in your HELD slot for skill bonuses. Find it under the TOOLS tab in your INVENTORY.

fields.Title: You: "Enough... just lie there, motionles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Enough... just lie there, motionless.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "You think they would let you -- unt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You think they would let you -- until you disintegrate into biomolecules? No, someone is breathing on your face now, inspecting your pupils. Stupid idiot.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Your name is *fuck all*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your name is *fuck all*.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Well, *almost* nothing. There is th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, *almost* nothing. There is the ground below you. That's still there. And the small light that's on -- fluttering -- somewhere in the Basal Ganglia.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Is it? The world is gone, you're no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is it? The world is gone, you're no longer reacting to outward stimuli. Yet still...

fields.Title: You: "I'm not coming back..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm not coming back...

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Yeah, man, what was that about?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, man, what was that about?

fields.Title: Coupris Kineema: "The water is cold, silvery  -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The water is cold, silvery  -- the stuff of *life itself* as it pours down your parched throat. The pounding in your head recedes, the darkness parts.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What happened?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happened?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That does sometimes happen." He ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That does sometimes happen." He hands you the remains of your ledger.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right." he hands you the waterlogg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right." he hands you the waterlogged remains of your ledger.

fields.Title: You: "What is that? It's cold..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is that? It's cold...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There was a call on the shortwave:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There was a call on the shortwave: officer passed out in Martinaise." He furrows his brow. "I had a feeling it would be you. I'm glad I got here in time."

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "That's me, blue eyes. That's me."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's me, blue eyes. That's me.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He replies with such understanding..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He replies with such understanding it's as if the burnt out ruins of the past were an occupational hazard -- athlete's foot for cops.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "The cool when you're dead, brother."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cool when you're dead, brother.

fields.Title: You: ""No." Push it away."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No." Push it away.

fields.Title: You: ""I should ask you the same.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should ask you the same."

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "Tell him! Tell him!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Tell him! Tell him!

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Again.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhmh. Now drink." He raises the ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhmh. Now drink." He raises the canister.

fields.Title: You: ""You know, in the Franconigerian ce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, in the Franconigerian centuries, the quality of water was so bad it was sometimes more hygienic to drink beer."

fields.Title: You: "Nothing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing?

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Nothing, sad brother. No treachery...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing, sad brother. No treachery. Just blackout.

fields.Title: You: "Who's that?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who's that?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He hands you the waterlogge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good." He hands you the waterlogged remains of your ledger.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Drink -- water." The lieutenant is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Drink -- water." The lieutenant is extending a small canister to your mouth.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good."

fields.Title: You: "Where is Voyager Road?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where is Voyager Road?

fields.Title: You: "So my name appears to be... Harry?"
fields.Dialogue Text: So my name appears to be... Harry?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ten minutes maybe.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ten minutes maybe."

fields.Title: You: "Smelled like betrayal."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smelled like betrayal.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "He speaks of the *sickening* longin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He speaks of the *sickening* longing, the unwell emotion. Even in the darkness he's grasping for it, still trying to hold on to the great sorrows slipping in the water -- slimy.

fields.Title: Volition: "There really *is* no use arguing wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There really *is* no use arguing with him. This is him exerting the reserves of authority he usually withholds. You can't even try to resist. All you can do is...

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Oh, but you are. They're pouring so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, but you are. They're pouring something on you, *in* you. It's...

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Ah, yes. And in the olfactory syste..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ah, yes. And in the olfactory system they call it The Apricot Chewing Gum Scented One. It's unhealthy of them to linger on it so. But -- as they say -- what do you do?

fields.Title: Perception (Taste): "It's DELICIOUS."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's DELICIOUS.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's just a drug addict myth. In..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just a drug addict myth. In reality you're still comprised of dihydrogen oxide, which you must replenish to go on living."

fields.Title: You: "Drink."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drink.

fields.Title: You: "No, it was beautiful!"
fields.Dialogue Text: No, it was beautiful!

fields.Title: You: "Just lie there, passed out."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just lie there, passed out.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There is no use arguing with me. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no use arguing with me. You will die if you don't." His voice is pressing: "DRINK."

fields.Title: Volition: "There really *is* no use arguing wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There really *is* no use arguing with him. This is him exerting the reserves of authority he usually withholds.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Don't prod at it, it will start mov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't prod at it, it will start moving again.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Who was what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who was what?

fields.Title: You: "Smelled so nice..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smelled so nice...

fields.Title: You: "There was something about a bow col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There was something about a bow collector too...

fields.Title: Coupris Kineema: "With greedy gulps, you down half a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With greedy gulps, you down half a litre of cold water. Some of it spills on the driver's seat -- the lieutenant pays no heed to it.

fields.Title: You: ""I... fuck it." Start climbing out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I... fuck it." Start climbing out of the motor-car. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Limbic System: "It didn't smell *nice*. It smelled..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It didn't smell *nice*. It smelled like BETRAYAL.

fields.Title: You: "Nice and quiet."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nice and quiet.

fields.Title: Coupris Kineema: "In the upholstered cabin of Lieuten..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the upholstered cabin of Lieutenant Kitsuragi's motor carriage, seated in the driver's basket. The air is thick with leatherworks and heavy fuel oil. Cold water runs down your chin.

fields.Title: You: "Yeah, that's the stuff!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, that's the stuff!

fields.Title: You: ""You know, I'm actually more of a *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, I'm actually more of a *magnesium* based lifeform now."

fields.Title: You: ""I was dehydrated. It won't happen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was dehydrated. It won't happen again." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: ""How long was I out?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "How long was I out?"

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Your name is *Passed Out on the Gro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your name is *Passed Out on the Ground*. Dragged around by one of the other evil apes. They're taking you somewhere...

fields.Title: You: "Then what is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Then what is it?

fields.Title: Limbic System: "It certainly ain't Harry."
fields.Dialogue Text: It certainly ain't Harry.

fields.Title: You: ""No. I don't wanna.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I don't wanna."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Suit yourself." He caps the canist..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Suit yourself." He caps the canister, uninterested in your petulance. With his brow furrowed he asks:

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Actually, beer and cider have *load..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Actually, beer and cider have *loads* of water in them.

fields.Title: You: "Drink."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drink.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Yeah, man. Fuck *everything*. Total..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, man. Fuck *everything*. Total blackout forever.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "There is no Voyager Road. There are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no Voyager Road. There are no roads. No houses. No lights in the windows. It's all on *pause*.

fields.Title: You: "No, I was *cool*. I'm cool."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, I was *cool*. I'm cool.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Yes, they're *pouring* something on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, they're *pouring* something on you -- something *in* you. And it's...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But these are not the *Franconiger..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But these are not the *Franconigerian centuries*. We are in the present. It is safe to sometimes drink water here." He hands you the canister.

fields.Title: You: ""I came in contact with the burnt o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I came in contact with the burnt out ruins of the past, lieutenant." (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You were reading your paperwork. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You were reading your paperwork. Then you passed out. I carried you to my Kineema... to take you to a hospital. Then you came to."

fields.Title: You: ""You're back?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're back?"

fields.Title: You: "Was that the ex-something? The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Was that the ex-something? The...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I found this next to you." He paus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found this next to you." He pauses. "I'll tag along for the rest of the day if you don't mind. My business is concluded anyway. Are you okay to go?"

fields.Title: You: "...where am I?"
fields.Dialogue Text: ...where am I?

fields.Title: Coupris Kineema: "Glowing lights on a dashboard emerg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Glowing lights on a dashboard emerge out of nothingness.

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "...bloated corpse of the past, resu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...bloated corpse of the past, resurfacing?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Drink." He tilts the canister. "Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Drink." He tilts the canister. "You haven't drunk water in two days. Did you know the human body is not made to survive on alcohol *alone*? You need a secondary form of hydration."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's solve this case." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's solve this case." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Limbic System: "...a bitter, caustic sense of loss..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...a bitter, caustic sense of loss remains. Even in the darkness, great sorrows slip in the water -- slimy.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Here in the Paleo-Mammalian Cortex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here in the Paleo-Mammalian Cortex we call it -- *the shadow*.
